markdown:
**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 130 2.0 **Usage** held in 1 hand **Bulk** 1 --- The visages of beasts are carved into the painted wood of a _beast staff_, with a large head on top. The staff is a _[+1 striking ](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2861) [staff](/Weapons.aspx?ID=367)_. While wielding the staff while you have it prepared, you’re affected by [_speak with animals_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1680). If you have [Animal Empathy](/Feats.aspx?ID=4709), you gain a +1 circumstance bonus on checks using it. **Activate** Cast a Spell; **Effect** You expend a number of charges from the staff to cast a spell from its list. **Craft Requirements** Supply one casting of all listed levels of all listed spells. Beast Staff **Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 130 2.0 **Price** 340 gp **Bulk** 1 ---
  • **Cantrip** [_ gouging claw_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1546)
  • **1st** [_ pest form_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1626), [_runic body_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1657)
  • **2nd** [_ animal form_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1440), [_enlarge_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1514)
Beast Staff (Greater) **Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 130 2.0 **Price** 1,400 gp **Bulk** 1 --- The staff is a _+2 striking staff_. The circumstance bonus if you have Animal Empathy is +2.
  • **3rd** _animal form_, [_insect form_](/Spells.aspx?ID=163)
  • **4th** _animal form_, [_bestial curse_](/Spells.aspx?ID=670), _insect form_, _pest form_
Beast Staff (Major) **Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 130 2.0 **Price** 6,250 gp **Bulk** 1 --- The staff is a _+2 greater striking staff_. The circumstance bonus if you have Animal Empathy is +2.
  • 5th _animal form_, insect form, [_moon frenzy_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1609)
  • **6th** [_cursed metamorphosis_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1479), _moon frenzy_
name: Beast Staff
